## User Journey Guides

### New User Journey
Perfect for first-time users:

1. **[Project Overview](../README.md)** ‚Üê Start here
2. **[Installation Guide](INSTALLATION.md)** ‚Üê Install the tool  
3. **[Quick Start Tutorial](CLI_REFERENCE.md#quick-start)** ‚Üê First commands
4. **[Complete CLI Reference](CLI_REFERENCE.md)** ‚Üê Learn all features

### Developer Journey
For those wanting to contribute:

1. **[Development Setup](DEVELOPMENT.md#development-environment-setup)** ‚Üê Environment setup
2. **[Testing Strategy](DEVELOPMENT.md#testing-strategy)** ‚Üê Understanding tests
3. **[Git Workflow](GIT_WORKFLOW.md)** ‚Üê Contribution standards
4. **[Issue Workflow](ISSUE_WORKFLOW.md)** ‚Üê Development process
5. **[Architecture Overview](ARCHITECTURE.md)** ‚Üê System understanding

### Operations Journey  
For production deployment and maintenance:

1. **[Deployment Strategies](DEPLOYMENT.md#deployment-strategies)** ‚Üê Production setup
2. **[Monitoring Setup](DEPLOYMENT.md#monitoring-and-observability)** ‚Üê Operational visibility
3. **[Troubleshooting Guide](TROUBLESHOOTING.md)** ‚Üê Issue resolution
4. **[Backup Procedures](DEPLOYMENT.md#backup-and-recovery)** ‚Üê Data protection

### Feedback and Improvements

**Found an issue with documentation?**

- **Broken links**: [Report the problem](https://github.com/phillipgreenii/mobilecombackup/issues)
